fields.name: The Scent Remained (C1)
fields.value: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

fields.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky (C2)
fields.value:
Extends the duration of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3s.
Decreases the Hydro RES of enemies hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

fields.name: Weaver of Verses (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Evilsoother (C4)
fields.value: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

fields.name: Embrace of Rain (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses (C6)
fields.value: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword - Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit enemies.
